content: Great post Mark, love the reality of it all. While we’ve never had such high visibility, dealing with ex-employees / founders with a grudge is always difficult and as you say, it’s not worth getting angry — that’s just a waste of energy. uBeam’s technology sounds interesting. We’ve worked on inductive power transfer for many years and suspect that route for the applications you are considering has probably been mined out, so a new approach may have good potential. I’m writing an intermittent blog on our latest startup journey, warts and all. Medium is such a great tool to use and hopefully someone may find it interesting or better still useful.
